purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of AI agents to address complex data challenges
principle: Built on Python, leveraging AI/ML frameworks and libraries for data processing and analysis
reusability: Modular architecture with APIs for easy integration and extension, supports plug-and-play components
limitations: Alpha stage with potential stability issues, limited documentation and community support at this stage
name: ryoma
description: Common AI agent framework solving your data problems
highlight: Unified framework for building AI agents focused on data problem-solving
